meanings.sent1: The balloon was enlargeable, so we could blow more air into it.
meanings.sent2: The backpack had an enlargeable pocket for extra storage.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so enlargeable that it seemed to grow in the oven!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an enlargeable canvas, spreading wider with each joke.
meanings.sent5: The garden hose was like an enlargeable snake, extending further as we pulled it.

meanings.sent1: The suitcase was enlargeable, allowing us to fit all our clothes.
meanings.sent2: The table had an enlargeable leaf to accommodate more guests.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curiosity was enlargeable, leading it to explore every corner of the house.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an enlargeable map, constantly seeking new knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The balloon animal was like an enlargeable sculpture, taking shape with each twist.

meanings.sent1: The font on the computer was enlargeable, making it easier to read.
meanings.sent2: The garden had an enlargeable area for planting more flowers.
meanings.sent3: The snowball fight became an enlargeable competition, with each team building bigger forts.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like an enlargeable balloon, filling with more love each day.
meanings.sent5: The cloud was like an enlargeable pillow, expanding as it drifted across the sky.
